headline: T-Mobile US (NasdaqGS:TMUS) Announces Exchange Offers For USCC Senior Notes
summary: T-Mobile US (NasdaqGS:TMUS) recently announced exchange offers for senior notes as part of its debt financing strategy. Despite the exchange offer news, the company's stock remained flat over the last week. The company's performance mirrored market trends, with broader downward pressure seen across tech stocks driven by geopolitical trade tensions affecting global markets. While T-Mobile's debt financing activities might have been expected to influence its shares, the prevailing negative...

headline: T-Mobile US, Inc. and T-Mobile USA, Inc. Announce Commencement of Exchange Offers and Consent Solicitations for Certain of United States Cellular Corporation’s Outstanding Debt Securities
summary: BELLEVUE, Wash., May 23, 2025--T-Mobile US, Inc. (NASDAQ: TMUS) (the "Company") today announced that it, together with T-Mobile USA, Inc., its wholly-owned subsidiary ("T-Mobile USA"), has commenced offers to exchange (the "Exchange Offers") any and all of certain outstanding senior notes of United States Cellular Corporation ("USCC"), pursuant to the Securities Purchase Agreement announced on May 24, 2024, under which the Company has agreed to purchase certain assets from USCC.
